roleset.name: be other than as expected
roleset.note: OTHERWISE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Slight comparison to differ.02 and other.01. Differ.02 is a member of Vn class differ-23.4. Framed by Katie. (from otherwise.01-j)

roles.note: This is often tagged as an adjective when used adverbially. (from otherwise.01-j)
